word: I could not advise the managers of the school to retain you in the school while you were leading other boys astray. If you will not be influenced and controlled by those wiser than you, if evil practices seem more desirable to you than those set forth in the word of God, you will influence others in the wrong direction. Said Christ:  "Ye will not come unto me that ye might have life." The power of purpose to resist temptation comes from Christ alone.
